1.0.name: wordpress/auto-ftp
1.0.description: Plugin allows you to save the host, user and password of your host ftp account so it no longer needs confirmation each and every time you install or update themes or plugins. <br/><br/> It automatically uses the ftp data you insert in the Auto FTP page under Settings Menu making instals and updates faster and easyer. <br/><br/> DONATE! <br/>DONATE HERE - (any ammount using paypal or credit card) <br/>
